description:
Looking for the biggest Lego sets? Lego bricks may be small, but the creations made using them are mighty. And over the years, an increasing number of absolutely vast sets have been released, combining thousands of tiny plastic pieces into gargantuan models of real-world places and fictional favorites. From conversation-starting display pieces to towering monuments, this guide tracks the biggest Legos of them all - including the Lego sets with the most pieces.

Before we begin, keep in mind that we’re measuring a Lego set’s size by the number of pieces it contains, not merely its physical dimensions. It's also worth remembering that size often equals difficulty, so this guide c
title: The 15 biggest Lego sets ever made

description:
Seeking the latest MTG release schedule? Our guide has everything you’re after on the newly revealed upcoming sets. From wild-west showdowns to haunted house horrors, there’s a lot to look forward to next year. We’ll be exploring some new worlds, revisiting some old favorites, and there’s even fresh Universes Beyond and Modern Horizons releases to enjoy. … Continued

Continue reading Magic: The Gathering release schedule 2024

title: Magic: The Gathering release schedule 2024

description:
A Critical Role whiskey is in the works, created by Find Familiar Spirits, the fandom-focused drinks company co-founded by actor Matthew Lillard. Sandkheg’s Hide is a custom-blended small-batch bourbon, based on the fiery beverage of the same name from Critical Role’s first campaign. Lillard tells Wargamer he’s “thrilled” to bring the drink to the Critter … Continued

Continue reading Matthew Lillard’s new DnD project is a Critical Role whiskey
title: Matthew Lillard’s new DnD project is a Critical Role whiskey

description:
Here are the most expensive, impressive, or otherwise plain cool Dragonite Pokémon cards. While some fans don’t like how the aesthetic of Dragonair and Dratini is lost in its sequel, there is something to be said for Dragonite’s awesome power disguised behind an adorable appearance. 

Dragonite might look like a sports mascot or winged moomin, but it's undeniably strong, both in the video games and the trading card game. There are lots of rare Pokémon cards featuring this big orange dragon, so we’re
title: The best rare Dragonite Pokemon cards

description:
A pre-con Thunder Junction Commander has triggered a sudden 545% price spike for Cerulean Wisps, a blue one-drop MTG card. The number comes from TCG marketplace MTGGoldfish, which saw the card’s value jump from $1.10 (£0.88) to $7.10 (£5.70) between April 12 and 18. The seeming cause of this leap? A tasty infinite combo. Cerulean … Continued

Continue reading MTG card spikes 545% due to Thunder Junction infinite combo
MORE FROM WAR
title: MTG card spikes 545% due to Thunder Junction infinite combo

description:
Wizards of the Coast revealed new art for the MTG Duskmourn set on the Magic Con Las Vegas website, and it’s giving major Ghostbuster vibes. Shared on April 17, the image shows Magic: The Gathering planeswalker Kaito, exploring a haunted house with a mysterious new character. Duskmourn: House of Horror is the final MTG set on this … Continued

Continue reading New MTG Duskmourn art is practically Ghostbusters

title: New MTG Duskmourn art is practically Ghostbusters
